data.title: Metro Connectivity With Bahadurgarh
data.meta_description: Bahadurgarh is a city and a municipal council in Jhajjar district in the Indian state of Haryana. It is one of the fastest developing towns of Haryana. Bahadurgarh21 is all about the city.
data.text:
The Bahadurgarh-Mundra Metro stretch has seven stations, out of which four are in Delhi. These are Mundka Industrial Area (MIE) Metro Station, Ghevra Metro Station, Tikri Kalan Metro Station and Tikri Border Metro Station. The other three are in Haryana â€” Pandit Shree Ram Sharma Metro Station, Bahadurgarh City Metro Station and Brig. Hoshiar Singh Metro Station.
